header.gameNote: C-USA MEN'S CHAMPIONSHIP - QUARTERFINALS AT EL PASO TX

article.headline: Tulsa 81, Rice 72
article.story: EL PASO, Texas -- Jordan Clarkson scored 21 points and Justin Hurtt added 15 to lead Tulsa to an 81-72 victory against Rice in a quarterfinal game in the Conference USA tournament on Thursday night. Steven Idlet had 12 points and eight rebounds for the second-seeded Golden Hurricane (19-12), who have won nine of their last 11 games and play No. 3 seed UTEP in a semifinal contest on Friday. Tamir Jackson scored 15 points and Arsalan Kazemi 12 for the 10th-seeded Owls (14-18), who never led on Thursday. Lucas Kuipers' 3-pointer got Rice within 74-70 with 59 seconds remaining, but Tulsa protected the lead by making 7 of 10 free-throw attempts down the stretch.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
